CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 17, 1954, pg. 16, reads: "Leech Farm Patients Stage 'Hobby Show' - Patients at Leech Farm Hospital staged their annual 'Hobby Show' of articles made by the patients while convalescing...In the center photo Mrs. Virginia Alexander stands before another display of work done by Leech Farm patients... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Man and Virginia Alexander posed behind table with dolls and crafts during "Hobby Show" at Leech Farm Hospital
